parameters.name: EndDateAfter
parameters.description: The execution ID of the task.

parameters.name: EndDateBefore
parameters.description: Specifies to query task executions that stop running at or later than the specified time.

parameters.name: ExecutionId
parameters.description: The status of the execution. Valid values: Running, Started, Success, Failed, Waiting, Cancelled, Pending, and Skipped.

parameters.name: IncludeChildTaskExecution
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 20 to 100. Default value: 50.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
Sorts the task executions to query. Valid values:

*   **StartDate**: specifies that the task executions are sorted based on the time when they are created. This is the default value.
*   **EndDate**: specifies that the task executions are sorted based on the time when the time when they stop running.
*   **Status**: specifies that the task executions are sorted based on their statuses.

parameters.name: ParentTaskExecutionId
parameters.description: Specifies whether to show the child nodes in the loop task. Default value: False.

parameters.name: SortField
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the task executions to query. Valid values:

*   **Ascending**: ascending order.
*   **Descending**: descending order. This is the default value.

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description: The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: StartDateAfter
parameters.description: Specifies to query task executions that stop running at or before the specified time.

parameters.name: StartDateBefore
parameters.description: Specifies to query task executions that start to run at or later than the specified time.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Specifies to query task executions that start to run at or before the specified time.

parameters.name: TaskAction
parameters.description: The execution ID of the parent node. In a loop task, set this parameter to the execution ID of the parent node.
